CONSOLE WARNING: line 10: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Checking if styles in the nested shadow roots apply properly to distributed elements. (v0 bug compatible)

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS getComputedStyle(span).color is "rgb(255, 0, 0)"
PASS getComputedStyle(span).backgroundColor is "rgb(0, 128, 0)"
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE

red?
